title: champion select bug
body: Hello, ever since i patched to 7.13 theres been this bug in champion select where if I'm not first pick the countdown timer will go all the way to zero, and then freeze. I've had to dodge 3 games because of this problem. If I try to select a champion, itll say an error has occurred. Also sometimes when I exit after this problem, the client will re open on the main menu options in a frozen state. I've patched the client and everything but nothing seems to work. Any suggestions ?

replies.body: Hmmmm it kind of sounds like your League client might be damaged or corrupted somehow. Let's run a quick repair through your client options to make sure everything is working properly, and then after that's done turn on *low-spec mode* in client as well. Test those changes in a practice/custom match and let me know how it helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dAEJYiEx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-03T00:56:15.817+0000)

I tried out your suggestion but the problem persists about 75% of the time. For more info check out this ticket: TICKET #30855945. Also I seem to be losing connection to chat right before this problem happens. I've tried reinstalling/hextech repair tool as well.

No worries! I've got your ticket pulled up and it looks like those techie's have been able to get you on your way to getting this packet loss smoothed out. Keep working with them and you should be able to get back on the Rift soon.
